- Good Buy Opportunity (deploy 15-30% of available USDT): RSI 30-40 with price touching/near lower Bollinger Band, healthy pullback in an uptrend, order book showing building support. Not present now.
- Normal Accumulation (deploy 10-20% of available USDT): RSI 40-50, price range-bound with no recent pump (>10% in 24h), steady accumulation signals. - BTC: If Normal Accumulation criteria are met (RSI ~40-50 and on-chain/volume supports accumulation) deploy 10-20% of USDT via up to 3 limit orders (2%, 3%, 4% or 2%, 3%, 5% below market price) to ladder in gradually.
